item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
Join @PapaSmoothie, John, @KeSwaab, AND @FAKER on the galactic adventure of the year with patch 6.1 Ascending Stars!
Taking off on April 17th UTC: 🌌New AG system 👊New champions 📈New ways to progress
… and more

item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X
item.description:
Sparkly stars aren’t the only thing we’re adding to the Rift! Learn more about some of the new items and other updates we’re bringing to the Rift in Patch 6.1! 💫
https://t.co/w5XJ19IkHH

item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X
item.description:
